title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction: Time and frequency-domain modelling and representation of large scale system (LSS). Hierarchical control of LSS. Decentralised control of LSS. Near-optimum design. Case studies. Stabilization of LSS using Linear Matrix Inequality (LMI) approach. Model reduction problem. Aggregation method, Perturbation methods (weakly coupled models, strongly coupled models). Balanced realisation-based model order reduction. Hankel based methods. Frequency domain methods for model order reduction-Pade Routh, continued-fraction expansion and mixed methods for SISO and MIMO systems. Low order controller design methods.
